languages.text: "Помни: вздумаешь обмануть меня, и тебя ждет участь хуже смерти. Я даже знаю, какая — на бледную мон-кай, без умолку трещавшей о вашей убогой религии, мой метод оказал должный эффект".
languages.translation_comment: Играется, если стартован FindKibellah. Выдаем Add9_FindKibellah
Играется, если стартован FindKibellah. Выдаем Add9_FindKibellah

languages.text: "Remember: if you try to deceive me, you will suffer a fate worse than death. I even know which fate specifically — the pale mon-keigh, the one who could not stop prattling about your pitiful faith, was quite susceptible to my method."
languages.original_text: "Помни: вздумаешь обмануть меня, и тебя ждет участь хуже смерти. Я даже знаю, какая — на бледную мон-кай, без умолку трещавшей о вашей убогой религии, мой метод оказал должный эффект".

languages.text: « N'oubliez pas : si vous essayez de me tromper, vous subirez un sort pire que la mort. J'ai même une idée bien précise de ce que je vous réserverais ; le mon-keigh pâle, vous savez, celui qui n'arrêtait pas de jacasser sur votre foi ridicule ? Il était particulièrement sensible à ma méthode. »
languages.original_text: "Remember: if you try to deceive me, you will suffer a fate worse than death. I even know which fate specifically — the pale mon-keigh, the one who could not stop prattling about your pitiful faith, was quite susceptible to my method."

traits.locale_text: « N'oubliez pas : si vous essayez de me tromper, vous subirez un sort pire que la mort. J'ai même une idée bien précise de ce que je vous réserverais ; le mon-keigh pâle, vous savez, celui qui n'arrêtait pas de jacasser sur votre foi ridicule ? Il était particulièrement sensible à ma méthode. »

languages.text: «Recuerda: si intentas engañarme, te espera un destino peor que la muerte. Hasta lo tengo elegido. Esa mon-keigh pálida, la que no podía callarse sobre vuestra ridícula fe, ha demostrado ser muy susceptible a mis métodos».
languages.original_text: "Remember: if you try to deceive me, you will suffer a fate worse than death. I even know which fate specifically — the pale mon-keigh, the one who could not stop prattling about your pitiful faith, was quite susceptible to my method."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerda: si intentas engañarme, te espera un destino peor que la muerte. Hasta lo tengo elegido. Esa mon-keigh pálida, la que no podía callarse sobre vuestra ridícula fe, ha demostrado ser muy susceptible a mis métodos».

languages.text: 「忘れるな。私を欺こうとすれば、死よりもひどい運命に苦しむだろう。どのようなものかハッキリ教えてもいい…青ざめたモン＝ケイ、その哀れな信仰心をベラベラと語り、私の餌食に簡単になりやすかった者」
languages.original_text: "Remember: if you try to deceive me, you will suffer a fate worse than death. I even know which fate specifically — the pale mon-keigh, the one who could not stop prattling about your pitiful faith, was quite susceptible to my method."

traits.locale_text: 「忘れるな。私を欺こうとすれば、死よりもひどい運命に苦しむだろう。どのようなものかハッキリ教えてもいい…青ざめたモン＝ケイ、その哀れな信仰心をベラベラと語り、私の餌食に簡単になりやすかった者」

languages.text: “别忘了，如果你打算骗我的话，你会遭受比死亡更加可怕的命运，我很清楚那究竟是怎样的命运。那只脸色苍白的猴子一直在喋喋不休，谈论你们那可怜的信仰，而我的手段对她相当有效。”
languages.original_text: "Remember: if you try to deceive me, you will suffer a fate worse than death. I even know which fate specifically — the pale mon-keigh, the one who could not stop prattling about your pitiful faith, was quite susceptible to my method."

traits.locale_text: “别忘了，如果你打算骗我的话，你会遭受比死亡更加可怕的命运，我很清楚那究竟是怎样的命运。那只脸色苍白的猴子一直在喋喋不休，谈论你们那可怜的信仰，而我的手段对她相当有效。”

languages.text: "Denkt daran: Wenn Ihr versucht, mich zu täuschen, erwartet Euch ein Schicksal schlimmer als der Tod. Ich weiß sogar, welches Schicksal exakt – der blasse Chem-Pan-Sey, der nicht aufhören konnte, von Eurem jämmerlichen Glauben zu schwafeln, war meiner Methode überaus zugänglich."
languages.original_text: "Remember: if you try to deceive me, you will suffer a fate worse than death. I even know which fate specifically — the pale mon-keigh, the one who could not stop prattling about your pitiful faith, was quite susceptible to my method."

traits.locale_text: "Denkt daran: Wenn Ihr versucht, mich zu täuschen, erwartet Euch ein Schicksal schlimmer als der Tod. Ich weiß sogar, welches Schicksal exakt – der blasse Chem-Pan-Sey, der nicht aufhören konnte, von Eurem jämmerlichen Glauben zu schwafeln, war meiner Methode überaus zugänglich."

languages.text: "Beni kandırmaya çalışırsan akıbetinin ölümden de beter olacağını aklından çıkarma. Kaderinde ne yazılı olduğunu bile biliyorum. Acınası inancınıza dair çenesini bir türlü kapatamayan solgun mon-keigh, yöntemlerime karşı son derece duyarlılık gösterecek."
languages.original_text: "Remember: if you try to deceive me, you will suffer a fate worse than death. I even know which fate specifically — the pale mon-keigh, the one who could not stop prattling about your pitiful faith, was quite susceptible to my method."
